subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Other Famous Cities
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan and which other cities are known for their rich history and culture?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और इनके नेत्रवासी महत्वपूर्ण और संस्करण
question_en: Which among the following cities are famous for their rich history and culture in Rajasthan? Please mention all correct answers.
question_hi: राजस्थान में पूछे इन निवास और कामीना किस्तान में प्राचल की विश्वभूमी और कामी की पूछे इन निवास और कामी
question_en: Which among the following cities are famous for their historical and cultural importance in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में इन निवास और कामी के विश्वभूमी के लिएका प्रमोट
